name: Sticky

topics.topic: BigtownTownServicesDo you have any traders in town? Any doctors?
topics.topic_text: This is a town, right? Where are the stores?
topics.response_text: I guess adults don't go to stores that much. That must be why there isn't anything here. Yeah. Yeah, that's it.{Sticky is unsure of his explanation. He doesn't know adult behavior or the Wasteland very well.}

topics.topic_text: This place looks like a ghost town.
topics.response_text: Nah, no way. Bigtown is a great place to be! I bet I could live over there, in that building with all the bullet holes and burn marks. Cool!{Sticky is completely oblivious to the signs of death and desperation.}

topics.topic: BigtownTownWhereDidYouComeFromWhere did you people come from, anyway?
topics.topic_text: Any idea why there are barricades surrounding the town?
topics.response_text: Well, I don't know. I guess the grownups built it when they got sick of little brats always hanging around them. I bet that's it!{Sticky is utterly clueless and easily excitable.}

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Oooh. I can't wait. Show us what to do!

topics.topic_text: Big Town? I've been there before.
topics.response_text: You have?{surprised and excited}

topics.topic_text: All right, let's go to Big Town.
topics.response_text: Alright! Yeah! Big Town, here we come!

topics.topic_text: Where the grownups live?
topics.response_text: Big Town. You've never heard of it? It's where all the grownups go.{shocked the player hasn't heard of Big Town}

topics.topic_text: Looks to me like you want someone to escort you to Big Town.
topics.response_text: Nah, I'm a grownup now. I can handle myself.{caught off guard and covering up his motive}

topics.topic_text: I want to visit Little Lamplight first. Maybe later.
topics.response_text: Why would you want to visit a bunch of snot-nosed children?{dismissive}

topics.topic_text: Fine. I'll take you to Big Town. But first I need to visit Little Lamplight.
topics.response_text: I'm not allowed in Little Lamplight anymore.{bitter (but trying to hide it)}

topics.topic_text: You got any caps? I'll escort you Big Town, but it'll cost you.
topics.response_text: Um... yeah... I got lots of caps! But they, um, they're at Big Town, so I can give them to you when we get there. Yeah!{(not exactly lying, but not exactly sure it's true) "yeah, that's the ticket!"}

topics.topic_text: You're on your own. I'm not interested in babysitting duty.
topics.response_text: I'm not a baby! I'm a grownup!{(pouting) extremely defensive (still childlike, but he's getting kicked out of his home because he's an adult)}

topics.topic_text: I can't take your babbling. You're on your own. Good luck getting to Big Town.
topics.response_text: What? But you said you'd take me. This bites. You really suck, you know that?! I hope a mutant bites your face off and you die! I hate you!{angry pouting}

topics.topic: MS01RedShortyGiveWeaponLooks like you could use a weapon.
topics.topic_text: You're going to need a weapon if you want to live to see Big Town.
topics.response_text: Oh wow, cool. What've you got for me? Minigun? Flamer? Maybe a missile launcher?{giddy at the prospect of getting his hands on a weapon}

topics.topic_text: For the love of God... Shut the hell up!
topics.response_text: You shut up!{(childish "You shut up", "No YOU shut up" back  and forth)}

topics.topic_text: Shut up, you!
topics.response_text: No, YOU shut up!{(childish "You shut up", "No YOU shut up" back  and forth)}

topics.topic_text: I'm not playing this game.
topics.response_text: Whatever.{dismissive}

topics.topic_text: Wow, you're annoying. You'd better make this worth my time.
topics.response_text: Um... yeah... I got tons of caps at Big Town. Well, they're not mine really. My girl friend's got them. Her name's Red.{not lying but sounding like he's making it up as he goes along}

topics.topic_text: You're starting to get on my nerves, Sticky...
topics.response_text: Oh... I'm sorry. I was just really excited. I'll, ah... I'll shut up now.{(sad and embarrassed) that he was told he was acting childish}

topics.topic_text: What's with the party hat?
topics.response_text: Oh. I forgot I had that on. It was for my birthday. Here, you take it. I don't want it anymore.{wants to get rid of a memento of sad memories}

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: Oh... okay... but PLEASE don't leave me here by myself... come back for me soon, okay?{imploring the player not to leave him alone}

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: I don't have to take that crap from you! Shut up!{like a naughty adolescent talking back to a parent}

conversation.response_text: Ah, but that sounds boring! I know   think of something cooler, and I'll come back later.{ }
I'm having a great time, here, Timebomb. But is everyone always this glum?{Sticky doesn't understand why everyone is so unhappy.}
I'm worried about Red!{worried about his girlfriend who's in trouble}
Alright! Hi there!{excited he might have found the person to help him}
Yeah baby!{(cheering) in an excited cheering mob}
There's nothing happy about it. This is the worst day of my life.{depressed and scared}
I'll wait over here for you. When you're done playing with the children we'll go to Big Town.{(accidentally sarcastic) trying to hide his disappointment}
I know, let's make up a story to pass the time.{making up a story (like a little kid) because he's bored}
Once upon a time, there was this man...{making up a story (like a little kid) because he's bored}
Hey you. Yeah you! Don't bother with the children at Little Lamplight. Let's go to Big Town instead!{calling out (wants some one to escort him to Big Town)}
There it is! We're almost there! Come on! Yiiipppiiieee!{extremely excited}
Right. Be sneaky. I can do that!{(like a kid playing a game) going into "stealth mode"}

combat.response_text: Come on, guys! We can do this!

description:
Sticky is a 16 year-old Caucasian Male.

A 16-year-old human male residing in Little Lamplight who goes by the name 'Jack.' He's known among Lamplighters as 'Sticky Hands' due to his tendency to take things that aren't his. Despite his age, he acts younger due to growing up without adult role models.

Sticky's Personality: Chatterbox, self-centered, attention-seeking, and immature. Despite his annoying tendencies, he has a good heart and is loyal to those he cares about.

Sticky's Backstory: Born and raised in Little Lamplight, a settlement exclusively for children. Without adult supervision, he developed immature behaviors and his reputation for taking things that catch his interest. He's formed a close bond with Red in Big Town, whom he considers his girlfriend. As he reaches the mandatory age of exile from Little Lamplight, he's facing great uncertainty about his future in the wasteland.
